title: YouTube Marketing Hub
description: The YouTube Marketing Hub: an updated library of content to help you get more views and subscribers on YouTube.
content: Create a YouTube ChannelWhat you'll learnLearn the specific steps for creating a popular YouTube channel from the ground up. You’ll also see actual examples of YouTubers that have built thriving channels in record time. 6 ResourcesPosition Your ChannelYouTube Channel NameChannel IconYouTube Channel ArtChannel DescriptionChannel TrailerStart nowCreate Videos for YouTubeWhat you'll learnLearn best tips and strategies for creating YouTube videos that generate thousands of views, likes, comments and subscribers. 6 ResourcesPlanning and OutliningFilming YouTube VideosYouTube Video EditingCardsEnd ScreenThumbnailStart nowOptimize Your YouTube VideosWhat you'll learnLearn exactly how to optimize your YouTube videos, including tags, titles, descriptions, watch time and more. 9 ResourcesYouTube Keyword ResearchYouTube Video TitleYouTube Video DescriptionYouTube TagsEngagement SignalsAudience RetentionWatch TimeChannel KeywordsYouTube HashtagsStart nowGrow Your ChannelWhat you'll learnLearn the secrets of the world’s most successful channels. See exactly how to get more views and subscribers with cool YouTube features like: Playlists, YouTube Studio and the new Community Tab. 6 ResourcesChannel SubscribersVideo ViewsPlaylistsYouTube StudioBranding WatermarkYouTube Community TabStart nowMake Money From YouTubeWhat you'll learnLearn how to monetize your videos by tapping into different monetization strategies, including brand partnerships, affiliate deals, crowdfunding, and more. 4 ResourcesMonetize With YouTube AdsSelling and PromotingCrowdfundingYouTube TrafficStart now

On all key channels.
